Nick Playfair

About Me

Hello! I'm a developer from Nottingham, UK. I've been interested in all things computing for as long as I can remember, and studied for my degree in Computer Science at the University of Lincoln. I have a particular passion for web development and open source projects.

Educaion and Work

BSc Computer Science (University of Lincoln), certifications from Harvard (edX) and Codecademy. I also completed a web development bootcamp run by Colt Steele.

I've worked on various projects for a number of companies including Nottingham Tennis Centre's website, the web store for Motifs printing and embroiderers, web hosting company Heart Internet

What I Enjoy

In my personal time I love to go swimming, play guitar, play and collect retro and import games (my favourite is the Nintendo Famicom).
